Uses of Interface
org.hyperledger.fabric.client.Gateway.Builder

  • Packages that use Gateway.Builder 
    Package Description
    org.hyperledger.fabric.client
    This package provides the set of interfaces that enable a Java application to interact with a Fabric blockchain network.

    • Uses of Gateway.Builder in org.hyperledger.fabric.client

      Methods in org.hyperledger.fabric.client that return Gateway.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Gateway.Builder Gateway.Builder.connection​(io.grpc.Channel grpcChannel)
      Specifies an existing gRPC connection to be used by the Gateway.
      Gateway.Builder Gateway.Builder.endpoint​(String url)
      Specifies the Gateway endpoint address in the form "host:post".
      Gateway.Builder Gateway.Builder.hash​(Function<byte[],​byte[]> hash)
      Specify the hashing implementation used to generate digests of messages sent to the Fabric network.
      Gateway.Builder Gateway.Builder.identity​(Identity identity)
      Specifies the client identity used to connect to the network.
      static Gateway.Builder Gateway.newInstance()
      Creates a gateway builder which is used to configure and connect a new Gateway instance.
      Gateway.Builder Gateway.Builder.signer​(Signer signer)
      Specify the signing implementation used to sign messages sent to the Fabric network.
      Gateway.Builder Gateway.Builder.tls​(InputStream tlsRootCerts, String serverNameOverride)
      Specifies the credentials required for making a TLS connection to the Gateway.
